Label: Study Identifier
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: ADSL.STUDYID

Label: Unique Subject Identifier
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: ADSL.USUBJID

Label: ADSL core variables are carried through all ADaM Datasets. See Core Variable column on the ADSL specs for variables kept on all ADaM datasets
Analysis Sequence Number
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: After sorting dataset by the KEYS, set to 1 for the first record per subject, then incremented by 1 for each subsequent record.

Label: Source Data
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
For PARAMCD in ('XLTRDURD', 'XLTRDURM', 'NVTRDURD', 'NVTRDURM', 'IPTRDURD', 'IPTRDURM', 'RLTRDURD', 'RLTRDURM'), set to 'ADSL'.
Otherwise, if SRCVAR is populated with a variable from ADEX (XLCUMDOS, DURTDH, NVCUMDOS, NVNUMINF, RLNUMINF, RLCUMDOS, IPCUMDOS, IPNUMINF, XAEREDS, XNDOSRED, XAEHLDS, XNDOSHLD, LOWDOSE, HLDAEDUR, NAEREDS, NNDOSRED, NAEHLDS, NNDOSHLD, RAEREDS, RNDOSRED, RAEHLDS, RNDOSHLD, IAEREDS, INDOSRED, IAEHLDS, INDOSHLD), set to "ADEX". 
Otherwise, null.

Label: Source Variable
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: See VLM for assigments.

Label: Source Sequence Number
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Null, as all parameters in ADEXSUM summarize results from multiple records from ADEX, are derived from other parameters in ADEXSUM, or are derived from variables from ADSL which do not carry SEQ.

Label: Parameter Category 1
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Set to "XL092" if parameter is derived from ADEX records where ADEX.ECTRT = 'XL092' or from ADSL variables that pertain to XL092.

Set to "Nivolumab" if parameter is derived from ADEX records where ADEX.ECTRT = 'Nivolumab' or from ADSL variables that pertain to Nivolumab.

Set to "Ipilimumab" if parameter is derived from ADEX records where ADEX.ECTRT = 'Ipilimumab' or from ADSL variables that pertain to Ipilimumab.

Set to "Relatlimab" if parameter is derived from ADEX records where ADEX.ECTRT = 'Relatlimab/Nivolumab FDC' or from ADSL variables that pertain to Relatlimab.

Label: Parameter (N)
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Assign based on PARAMCD, as per the codelist

Label: Parameter Code
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Assign as per VLM

Label: Parameter
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Assign as the decoded version of PARAMCD, as per the codelist

Label: Analysis Value
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: See VLM for details

Label: Analysis Criterion 1 (Hold 7day)
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
if PARAMCD in (DURTDH,DURTDHAE, TOTHLDAE, HLDAEDUR) then do:
Set to "Dose Hold >= 7 days" if AVAL>=7

Label: Criterion 1 Evaluation Result Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: set to Y for the records with CRIT1 populated
